text: Myriocoleopsis is a genus of liverwort in family Lejeuneaceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Myriocoleopsis fluviatilis, (Steph.) Reiner & Gradst. == References == Category:Porellales genera Category:Lejeuneaceae Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Myriocoleopsis
